00027 #ifndef BOOST_NO_STD_LOCALE
00028 
00029 #include <locale>     // for std::locale
00030 #include <streambuf>  // for std::basic_streambuf
00031 
00032 namespace boost{
00033 namespace archive{
00034 
00038 template < typename Ch, class Tr >
00039 class basic_streambuf_locale_saver
00040 {
00041 public:
00042     typedef ::std::basic_streambuf<Ch, Tr> state_type;
00043     typedef ::std::locale aspect_type;
00044     explicit basic_streambuf_locale_saver( state_type &s )
00045         : s_save_( s ), a_save_( s.getloc() )
00046         {}
00047     basic_streambuf_locale_saver( state_type &s, aspect_type const &a )
00048         : s_save_( s ), a_save_( s.pubimbue(a) )
00049         {}
00050     ~basic_streambuf_locale_saver()
00051         { this->restore(); }
00052     void  restore()
00053         { s_save_.pubimbue( a_save_ ); }
00054 private:
00055     state_type &       s_save_;
00056     aspect_type const  a_save_;
00057 };
00058 
00059 } // archive
00060 } // boost
00061 
00062 #endif // BOOST_NO_STD_LOCALE
00063 #endif // BOOST_ARCHIVE_BASIC_STREAMBUF_LOCALE_SAVER_HPP
